```{r}
housing <- read.csv("House_listing.csv")
attach(housing)
head(housing)
```


```{r}
print("missing values:")
for(col in unique(names(housing))) {
  cat(col, ":", length(housing[is.na(housing[[col]])]), "\n")
}
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
length(housing$Latitude[!between(Latitude, 42, 83)])
length(housing$Longitude[!between(housing$Longitude, -141, -52)])
housing$Longitude[housing$Longitude == 63.1005] <- -63.1005
length(housing$Longitude[!between(housing$Longitude, -141, -52)])
write.csv(housing, file = "cleaned_housing.csv")

```


```{r}
housing$Price <- as.numeric(gsub(",", "", housing$Price))
num_cols <- housing[sapply(housing, is.numeric)]
for(col in names(num_cols)) {
  boxplot(housing[col], main=col)
  cat(col, "outliers:")
  print(unique(boxplot.stats(housing[[col]])$out))
}
```
